name: Cursola
description: Its shell is overflowing with its heightened otherworldly energy. The ectoplasm serves as protection for this Pokémon's core spirit.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.effect: Whenever a physical move hits this Pokémon, its Speed rises one stage and its Defense falls one stage.  This ability triggers on every hit of a multiple-hit move.
abilities.description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

abilities.name: Perish Body
abilities.description: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.
